content: I'm replacing llvm_asm! with asm!. The line I'm replacing uses the volatile option. Am I correct in assuming that the asm! syntax assumes volatile by default?
Yes, there is a pure flag instead that has the same effect as omitting volatile in llvm_asm!: https://github.com/rust-lang/rfcs/blob/master/text/2873-inline-asm.md#options-1
